name: Add or delete leaves from Google Calendar in Status Hero
description:
When a new leave in shared Google calendar is added or the leave is prolonged, the dates of the leave are uploaded in Status Hero. Conversely, when a leave is deleted, the dates in Status Hero are cancelled.
Please ensure that employees in case of shortening the length of their leave first delete all the leave and then upload updated shorter leave! Otherwise the deleted days will not be cancelled in Status Hero.
